body.name: TIGERSECU 5MP Super HD 4-in-1 Security Camera with OSD Switch, for TVI/CVI/AHD/D1 DVR, Weatherproof for Indoor/Outdoor Use (Power Supply and Coaxial Cable Sold Separately)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 10 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 55 mins
features: This versatile TIGERSECU 5MP Super HD security camera features a 4-in-1 camera switch that allows you to use it with 4 different types of security DVRs including HD-TVI, AHD, CVI and CVBS (D1) DVRs.

Compatible with high definition 5MP DVRs (2560 x 1920 pixels) by TIGERSECU, Swann, Lorex, Samsung, Night Owl, Q-See, Annke and more. This camera does not work with SDI DVRs, and does not work with DVRs that do not support 5MP cameras. This camera does not have audio functionality and does not record sound. Contact TIGERSECU’s Help Desk to check compatibility.

Ultra high-definition 5MP security camera capable of generating crystal clear 2560 x 1920 pixels (5 megapixels) video when used with a 5MP DVR, and 1280 x 1920 pixels when used with compatible 1080P DVRs.

Heavy-duty metal IP66 weatherproof casing for indoor and outdoor use. Powerful night vision to 100 feet (30 meters) with image sensor 1/2.7” progressive scan CMOS 5035, 4mm fixed lens, 36PCS IR LED, and IR cut filters.
This set includes one wired 5MP 4-in-1 security camera, 3 screws and a quick start guide. Power supply and coaxial video cables are sold separately.

productInformation.value: TIGERSECU 5MP Super HD Hybrid 4-in-1 Security Camera with OSD switch

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Compatible with TVI, CVI, AHD, and D1 DVRs that support a minimum 5MP resolution

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5MP Super High Definition See the difference with 5MP Super High Definition Be protected and see every detail with crystal clear Super High Definition. TIGERSECU's latest state-of-the-art surveillance technology is 5 Megapixels (5MP) Super HD, the highest resolution in our range and is 2.4 times clearer than 1080p video.
Day/Night Surveillance See everything day or night See in the dark up to 100 feet (30 meters) with powerful infrared night vision which automatically kicks in as night falls.

Heavy-Duty, Weatherproof Cameras Weatherproof IP66 rated cameras built to withstand rain, snow and heat, all year round TIGERSECU’s heavy-duty IP66 weatherproof rating security cameras are built tough to withstand severe weather conditions and are suitable for outdoor and indoor use. These durable, outdoor-use bullet cameras resist damage from rain, snow, and the elements.

5MP 4-in-1 Wired Security Camera 1080P 4-in-1 Wired Security Camera 1080P 4-in-1 Wide Angle Dome Camera Video Resolution 5MP Super HD 1080P Super HD 1080P Super HD Hard Wired or Wireless Hard wired Hard wired Hard wired Compatible with HD-TVI, AHD, CVI, CVBS 960H D1 Analog DVRs HD-TVI, AHD, CVI, CVBS 960H D1 Analog DVRs HD-TVI, AHD, CVI, CVBS 960H D1 Analog DVRs Weatherproof Cameras 1 Bullet Camera (5MP), IP66 Weatherproof 1 Bullet Camera (1080p), IP66 Weatherproof 1 Dome Camera (1080p), IP66 Weatherproof Night Vision Up to 100-feet Up to 100-feet Up to 100-feet

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The new 5 k camera
reviews.reviewText: The new 5k camera is amazing the picture is amazing the night vision is fantastic. I bought one to try wow i bought two more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Samsung Bullet Camera Replacement
reviews.reviewText: The obsolete Samsung Bullet Camera (SDC-9441BC) can be replaced with the better quality TIGERSECU 5MP Super HD 4-in-1 Security Camera.Also, the obsolete Samsung SDH-C75100 Security Camera’s DVR can be replaced with the better quality TIGERSECU Super HD 1080P 16-Channel Hybrid 4-in-1 DVR.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5MP video camera review
reviews.reviewText: Great camera. I bought this to upgrade from a 1080p camera I already had. The 5MP camera is much clearer in live view, but I don’t see a tremendous difference on recorded video, although it is better. The 5MP camera has a wider field of view so this one shows about an 80’ wide area at a distance of 40’. Perfect for my particular application.
